fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A column about Boris Johnson said of the Daily Telegraph’s response to the launch of his Conservative leadership campaign: “Janet Daley accused [the BBC’s Laura] Kuenssberg of ‘speaking with clear distaste on behalf of the chattering classes’.” It was the columnist Allison Pearson who made this accusation (The posh populist who’s tuning in to the Brexit blues, 17 June, page 35). • Other recently corrected articles include: Schoolgirls for sale: why Tokyo struggles to stop the ‘JK business’ Record numbers of NHS cancer patients face ‘agonising wait’ to see specialist
